metal_fakeout.name: Metal Fakeout
metal_fakeout.desc: Create a metal clone and appear behind your taget.

metal_gatling.name: Metal Gatling
metal_gatling.desc: A deadly rush of several metallic rods.

metal_rain.name: Metal Rain
metal_rain.desc: Rain down a incredible amount of metal rods

iron_hug.name: Iron Hug
iron_hug.desc: Grab your opponent and crush them with your ironclad grip.

metal_eruption.name: Metal Eruption
metal_eruption.desc: The user stomps on the ground, and spawns a fury of metal spikes

iron_slam.name: Iron Slam
iron_slam.desc:
Conjure a giant rod of metal and slam it down.
[*Guardbreaks at Level 5]

rocket_lance.name: Rocket Lance
rocket_lance.desc: Create a lance, impale your opponent, and send them flying.

metal_armament.name: Metal Armament
metal_armament.desc: Coat both your body and sword in an ironlike and fluctuating iron-bits. While active, it will swing a Kyrscleave-like Greatsword upon m1 (with an interval of 3s).

iron_quills.name: Iron Quills
iron_quills.desc: Conjure metal from within, impaling surrounding enemies.

metal_kick.name: Metal Kick
metal_kick.desc: A powerful kick laced with metal.

firing_line.name: Firing Line
firing_line.desc: The user spawn 5 gun behind them which will start firing at the target immediately.

oxidizing_rush.name: Oxidizing Rush
oxidizing_rush.desc: Conjure metal swords and rush forward with them
